entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
